page.title: 08Translation of Local Dialect
page.content: In my street,my friend Gary and myself have found a way of Break Dancing that no one else knows how to do.We have thought about doing something to impress the others for a long time.They gather at the corner of our street every night but Gary and I tend not to bother with them.We had higher ambitions. One day we decided that we would put on a show to really impress them.Gary began by spinning on his head and doing a backflip over me.They were really impressed.However Beany came along and boasted how much better he was at Break Dancing and then he started to give a demonstration.However he slipped and fell on Brenda's foot who then struck him over the head,Gary and I couldn't stop laughing but we thought it was to avoid Beany since then. Lee Murfin and Gary Latham
